channel.title: Anyone like Bob Marley?
channel.description:
Anyone like Bob Marley?
I think that guy is the man! His songs are so relaxing. Perfect when your angry or feeling blue, lol. :)
If anyone is interested (from AlbumBase.com): http://www.rapidshare.com/files/25702581/Bob_Marley_-_The_Best_of_Bob_Marley_1__1_.Effekt.rar

item.title: Anyone like Bob Marley?
item.dc:creator: @kmb Kmb
item.description:
@kmb wrote:

Song for the moment:

No, woman, no cry; No, woman, no cry; No, woman, no cry; No, woman, no cry.

Said - said - said: I remember when we used to sit
In the government yard in trenchtown,
Oba - obaserving the ypocrites
As they would mingle with the good people we meet.
Good friends we have, oh, good friends weve lost
Along the way.
In this great future, you cant forget your past;
So dry your tears, I seh.

No, woman, no cry;
No, woman, no cry.
ere, little darlin, dont shed no tears:
No, woman, no cry.

Said - said - said: I remember when-a we used to sit
In the government yard in trenchtown.
And then georgie would make the fire lights,
As it was logwood burnin through the nights.
Then we would cook cornmeal porridge,
Of which Ill share with you;
My feet is my only carriage,
So Ive got to push on through.
But while Im gone, I mean:
Everythings gonna be all right!
Everythings gonna be all right!
Everythings gonna be all right!
Everythings gonna be all right!
I said, everythings gonna be all right-a!
Everythings gonna be all right!
Everythings gonna be all right, now!
Everythings gonna be all right!

So, woman, no cry;
No - no, woman - woman, no cry.
Woman, little sister, dont shed no tears;
No, woman, no cry.

I remember when we used to sit
In the government yard in trenchtown.
And then georgie would make the fire lights,
As it was logwood burnin through the nights.
Then we would cook cornmeal porridge,
Of which Ill share with you;
My feet is my only carriage,
So Ive got to push on through.
But while Im gone:

No, woman, no cry;
No, woman, no cry.
Woman, little darlin, say dont shed no tears;
No, woman, no cry.

Eh! (little darlin, dont shed no tears!
No, woman, no cry.
Little sister, dont shed no tears!
No, woman, no cry.)

I definitely enjoy his songs

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone like Bob Marley?
item.dc:creator: @gho5t gho5t
item.description:
@gho5t wrote:

OMG SMOKE HERB FTW.
Man Bob Marley has the best chillax songs ever.
Its almost like smokin weed, you just sorta drift away.
(my favorite song is Doobie Conquerer :D)

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone like Bob Marley?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

I get so relaxed when I listen to his music. When I’m angry about something, I listen to him and I feel like everything is fine. I just stop caring about anything else. Not all his songs are good, but a lot of them are pretty nice.

Read full topic
